tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE translations(
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  source_language TEXT,
  target_language TEXT,
  text TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE models (
    model_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    model_name VARCHAR,
    model_version FLOAT,
    training_data_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (training_data_id) REFERENCES translations(id)
);

CREATE TABLE Language (id INT PRIMARY KEY, language_code VARCHAR(5), language_name VARCHAR(50))
CREATE TABLE Translation (id INT PRIMARY KEY, source_language_id INT, target_language_id INT, translation_text TEXT)
CREATE TABLE Dataset (id INT PRIMARY KEY, dataset_name VARCHAR(100), dataset_size INT, language_id INT)
CREATE TABLE Model (id INT PRIMARY KEY, model_name VARCHAR(100), model_type VARCHAR(50), dataset_id INT)
